QuestData.Title: Prisoner of War
QuestData.Description: Malygos has taken Keristrasza to serve as his consort!$b$bWe cannot allow this to come to pass.$B$BYou must do whatever it takes to spare her such a fate, $r.
QuestData.LogDescription: Warmage Kaitlyn wants you to free Keristrasza.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you located Keristrasza? Were you able to free her from her bonds?
QuestData.RewardText: So, it is done then....$b$bOur kind shall never forget the sacrifice Keristrasza has made for this cause.
